940010.name: Star Control: Origins - Original Soundtrack
940010.description:
添加Star Control: Origins原声集到你的库中！包含广受欢迎的开放世界RPG冒险游戏中超过40首配乐，这些史诗般的音乐会为你的星际探险旅程带来别样的乐趣。

知名作曲家Mason Fisher(Age of Wonders, Eye of the Beholder III: Assault on Myth Drannor)与Riku Nuottajärvi (Star Control II: The Ur-Quan Masters)联袂创作超过40首音乐，充满活力与情感的歌曲完美地表达了Star Control: Origins的精神所在。

不论是遇到狡猾（但是友好）的泰沃姆族时响起的轻快悦动的主题音乐，还是遭遇恐怖的斯奎夫族时响起的黑暗危险又低沉的主题音乐，亦或是你在星际中邂逅新的外星族群、探索星球、进行生与死的对决等等，你都能体会到绝妙的配乐带来的视听享受。

原声集目录

  • Alien Altercation

  • Dust and Grit
  • Battle Stations

  • Hot Foot
  • The Suns Never Set
  • Orbital Mechanics
  • No Place Like Moop
  • Here There Be Dragons
  • Regrets, We've Had A Few
  • Tranquility Base
  • Agendas
  • Your Orders
  • Red Alert
  • Cold as Ice

Disc 2
  • Aristocratic Appetites
  • Sweaty To Meet You
  • Gems and Baubles
  • Perilous Expanse
  • Song of the Stars
  • The Age Of Fraud
  • They Should Have Sent A Poet
  • Improve You
  • Not From Around Here
  • Corruption
  • We Know What We Are
  • Substantial Deposits
  • The Spymasters
  • Volumes and Volumes
  • Our Song
  • Land of Husks and Promises
  • Engage
  • Abyss Stares Back
  • A Turning of the Great Arms
  • Lexites 2086
  • Ship Synthesis
  • Poise and Grace
  • What Had To Be Done
940010.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
